# [Interview #1112: JordanCon 6 - Cosmere questions, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1112#13)

#### Question

Will Hoid ever have a book of his own?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes he will. He will several.
